data.name: ReadDebt
data.value: select top(1) OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OB_TRN_ID, OB_TRN_TYP, DEBT_TYP, CSP_SUP_NUMBER, CPA_SUP_TYPE, OTY_TYPE from CKT_OB_TRN where (OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (OB_TRN_TYP = @obTrnTyp) and (OB_TRN_ID = @obTrnId) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadDebtDetail
data.value: select top(1) OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, OTY_TYPE, OTR_TYPE, BAL_DUE_AMT, INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, RETIRED_DT, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY from CKT_DEBT_DTL where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrGeneratedId = OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER)

data.name: UpdateDebtDetail
data.value: update CKT_DEBT_DTL set BAL_DUE_AMT = @balDueAmt, INT_BAL_DUE_AMT = @intBalDueAmt, RETIRED_DT = @retiredDt, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy where (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OTR_GENERATED_ID = @otrGeneratedId) and (OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType)
